pages.text: Astraspis is an Ordovician agnathan with unique scutes all over its head shield. It was more of a flat agnathan and it had a short tail. It got its name from the bony plates that covered its headshield.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
